metadata.title: CVE-2019-20445 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
HttpObjectDecoder.java in Netty before 4.1.44 allows a Content-Lengthheader to be accompanied by a second Content-Length header, or by aTransfer-Encoding header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnetty-java - 1:4.1.7-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

libnetty-3.9-java - 3.9.9.Final-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netty package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.7-4ubuntu0.1').
netty-3.9 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.9.9.Final-1+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
